attributes.action: Decrease the reliance on safety cameras and increase the amount of traffic police patroling our roads.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Safety cameras only get the speeders, traffic police are needed for the dangerous drivers, uninsured drivers, mobile phone users, drink drivers, etc.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
